name: Extra+Ordinary
description:
We are Imagination Station, a video game development group from UCF's Game Design program. For our capstone project, we are creating "Extra+Ordinary", a game about childhood imagination and the importance of empathy. Extra + Ordinary is available now!
_________________________________________________________________________

Gameplay Features:

  • Explore three exciting levels and battle shadow enemies!
  • Unravel an emotional relationship between two brothers!
  • Meet fun and quirky imaginary friends along the way!

_________________________________________________________________________

Meet the Team:

  • Jody Mewbourn - Producer
  • Victoria Gillis - Creative Director

  • Julian Maceira - 3D & 2D Art
  • Gabriel Malaret - VFX & Videographer
  • Austin Menard - Level Design
  • Travis Nugent - Programmer & Accessibility
  • Eric Osorio - Programmer & System Admin
  • Kory Rogers - Programmer
  • Roque Tacsa - 3D Art
  • Kylon Tome - UI Art & 2D Art
  • Justin Ton - Art Lead & 3D Lead
  • Dwight Waller - Level Design
